name: mimir
description: MCP server combining TODO tracking with external memory (Graph-RAG) for AI agents. Track tasks hierarchically while storing rich context in associative memory networks.

scripts.docker:restart: npm run docker:down && npm run docker:up
scripts.setup:deps: npm install && npm install -g typescript ts-node
scripts.setup:auth: gh auth status || gh auth login
scripts.setup:copilot: npm list -g copilot-api || npm install -g copilot-api && (pgrep -f copilot-api || nohup copilot-api start &)
scripts.setup:verify: node -e "console.log('âœ… Node.js:', process.version); console.log('âœ… npm:', require('child_process').execSync('npm --version', {encoding:'utf8'}).trim()); try { require('child_process').execSync('docker --version', {stdio:'pipe'}); console.log('âœ… Docker: Available'); } catch(e) { console.log('âŒ Docker: Not available'); } try { require('child_process').execSync('gh --version', {stdio:'pipe'}); console.log('âœ… GitHub CLI: Available'); } catch(e) { console.log('âŒ GitHub CLI: Not available'); }"

scripts.ollama:build: docker-compose build ollama && docker-compose up -d --no-deps ollama
scripts.webui:setup: docker exec -it mimir-open-webui pip install neo4j
scripts.webui:build: docker-compose build open-webui && docker-compose up -d --no-deps open-webui
